entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:52 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 5:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: WNW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
